alert.note: Alert for St. Charles; St. John The Baptist (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 5:01PM CDT until September 07 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... St. John The Baptist Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Northwestern St. Charles Parish in southeastern Louisiana... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 501 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles north of Laplace, moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Reserve, Hahnville, Laplace, Killona, Norco, Montz, Edgard, Luling, Garyville, Boutte, Wallace, Destrehan, Taft, New Sarpy, and St. Rose. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 201 and 219. Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 14. Interstate 310 between mile markers 4 and 11. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move immediately to shelter inside a strong building. Stay away from windows.

area.areaDesc: St. Charles; St. John The Baptist
